long_description: Personalize your backpack with a hipbelt just for you. Made for Osprey Argon packs, this hipbelt customizes your fit for miles of comfort! Providing superior load support, this BioForm split wing hipbelt is a thermoformed, laminated closed-cell foam with an outer supportive shell. The foam technology in BioForm hipbelts allows heat-molding for a custom fit. Osprey certified Custom Molding is available in most stores-check your local REI store for a custom hipbelt molding oven. ErgoPull hipbelt closure optimizes cinching leverage, drawing tension along belt's top and bottom, not through its center, relieving hipbone pressure.
short_description: Personalize your backpack with a hipbelt just for you. Made for Osprey Argon packs, this hipbelt customizes your fit for miles of comfort!
